LanguageData.Norballo_Loincloth.label: Loincloth
LanguageData.Norballo_Stripants.label: Striped trousers
LanguageData.Norballo_Stripants.description: striped trousers with suspenders to ensure they stay on even on the most wrathful winds. True Norbal fashion
LanguageData.Norballo_Shirt.label: mundane shirt
LanguageData.Norballo_Shirt.description: very mundane shirt. slightly warmer than most base clothing
LanguageData.Norballo_Furcoat.label: furcoat
LanguageData.Norballo_Furcoat.description: Furry long cape. really, really warm
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalMuffshoes.label: fur boots
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalMuffshoes.description: Very furry and warm boots. Helps with moving through terrain (Worn on feet, 3rd layer)
